verses.roman:
bhikṣā karāila prabhure sasneha yatane
rūpa-gosāñi dui-bhāiye karāila bhojane

synonyms: bhikṣā karāila—made take His lunch; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sasneha—with affection; yatane—with great care; rūpa-gosāñi—Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; dui-bhāiye—the two brothers; karāila bhojane—made eat.
translation: Thus Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was offered lunch with great care and affection. The brothers Rūpa Gosvāmī and Śrī Vallabha were also offered food.
